Package org.hibernate.boot.beanvalidation

Interface BeanValidationLogger

All Superinterfaces:
org.jboss.logging.BasicLogger
@MessageLogger(projectCode="HHH") @ValidIdRange(min=101001, max=101500) @Internal public interface BeanValidationLogger extends org.jboss.logging.BasicLogger
Sub-system logging related to Bean Validation integration
